      • getSectionFragmentCount

        public int getSectionFragmentCount()
        Return the number of sections to be displayed in the profile, each one with the corresponding tab. By default, ProfileActivity will show only the main section. Override this method to provide your own sections, that will be requested at loading time in "getSectionFragment"
        Returns:
